pages.text: The $(thing)Conduit$() is unquestionably an indispensable companion for any kind of work carried out underwater. Too bad it's bound to a one location. The $(item)Ocean Heart Aspect$() seeks to solve this problem by granting access to $(thing)Conduit Power$() while it is active.
In the name of the almighty $(o)balancing$() however, it introduces a new restriction: it only works while both active and sensing your health below $(thing)75%$() of it's maximum.
